summary: Experienced Digital Marketing Strategist with a strong background in developing and executing data-driven marketing strategies. Proven track record in creating comprehensive paid media strategies for B2B SaaS clients and maximizing ROI through effective campaign management and performance analysis.

description: Developed a competitive intelligence framework using Python and Flask, automating competitor pricing and market demand tracking for a real estate client.
Built a multi-agent AI workflow, leveraging Docker and AWS, for a healthcare provider, reducing analysis time by 50%.
Architected a scalable analytics platform consolidating data sources into a single source of truth, enhancing decision-making for a telecom provider.
Led consulting engagements across multiple sectors, delivering strategic presentations that influenced corporate strategy.
Directed strategic planning and data-driven marketing initiatives for Enrollment Services and Alumni Relations, enhancing engagement.
Conducted comprehensive market research and data analysis to guide recruitment strategies and optimize campaign performance.
Led development of a scalable multi-touch attribution framework using Python and SQL, enhancing marketing performance insights.
Designed and implemented A/B/n and multivariate testing, optimizing campaign strategies and increasing ROI.
Managed a team of analysts, mentoring them in Python and statistical modeling to improve campaign effectiveness.
Built ETL pipelines using Python to consolidate data from multiple platforms, enhancing data accessibility and insights.
Created executive dashboards for C-suite stakeholders, providing comprehensive KPI visibility across 20+ enterprise clients.
Conducted in-depth market research and developed go-to-market strategies, facilitating national expansion for new products.
Led digital transformation projects, advising on consumer engagement campaigns and enhancing digital presence.
